text: Howell Evans (3 March 1928 - 9 September 2014) was a Welsh actor, comedian, and singer. He worked in television and theatre. He worked more than 60 years. He played "Daddy" in the Sky1 TV comedy drama series Stella. Evans died on 9 September 2014. He was 86 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Glamorgan Category:Welsh comedians Category:Welsh movie actors Category:Welsh singers Category:Welsh stage actors Category:Welsh television actors
title: Howell Evans
